name: Resume
body:
#SKILLS SNAPSHOT
##Languages
Languages and frameworks in my toolbox:
- Proficient with: Java, JavaEE, CSS/CSS3, HTML/HTML5, XML, SQL
- Proficient with associated Java technologies such as Hibernate and JDBC, JSF, Springframework, JSP, Swing.
- Proficient with Javascript, AngularJS and JQuery 
- Experience with Managing Linux Servers
- Experience with AWS 

##Software and Tools
Software Iâ€™ve used extensively:
- Version Control: Git, Mercurial, SVN
- Database: MySQL, MSSQL, Oracle, Sybase
- Build Management: Maven, Jenkins, Ant, Bamboo
- Issue tracking: JIRA and JIRA administration.
- Operating Systems: Windows, Linux
- Adobe Photoshop, Word, Excel, Access, Powerpoint

##Business
Other essential skills:
- Professional communication with customers and clients.
- Ability to work closely with and determine requirements from a wide range of clients.
- Produce clear and consise technical documentation.
- Training and education of other team members.
